title: Goes Well With Onigiri....?
detail_text: <:th_ch0204/>Hanayo-chan, what do you think about this tea leaf?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Houjicha? *Sniff sniff*.... Uwaaah, it smells good~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Wait. This one also seems perfect. Here.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>This one is.... genmaicha! Waaah, I like this one too. Hmm, I don’t know which one to go for~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Fufu, worrying about things like this is fun, isn’t it?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Ehehe, you’re right. I wonder which would go well with onigiri~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Well, if we’re pairing it with your delicious onigiri, then we have to pick the best one, right, Hanayo-chan♪ I really love your onigiri.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Leave it to me! I’ll make the best onigiri with pickled plums this time, okay!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>I’ll look forward to it. But first, we have to decide which tea to get.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>I can’t choose~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
